aboutCampaign.moduleDescription: Master BPMN concepts by building an airport process model step-by-step

scenarios.scenarioDescription: Set up the check-in area for passenger processing and luggage handling

CheckIn: thought someone else did the check-in.
thought the bought ticket was the check-in.
Luggage: thought luggage was small enough to have on the plane.

scenarios.scenarioDescription: Add security screening with boarding card and luggage scanning

CarryOnScan: had carry-on items that weren't scanned.
BodyScan: didn't go through the body scanner.
